00001 // Distributed under MIT licence. See https://github.com/aniabrown/QuEST/blob/master/LICENCE.txt for details
00002 
00010 # include <math.h>
00011 
00012 # ifndef QUEST_PRECISION_H
00013 # define QUEST_PRECISION_H
00014 
00015 
00016 // set default double precision if not set during compilation
00017 # ifndef QuEST_PREC
00018 # define QuEST_PREC 2
00019 # endif
00020 
00021 
00022 /*
00023  * Single precision, which uses 4 bytes per amplitude component
00024  */
00025 # if QuEST_PREC==1
00026     # define qreal float
00027     // \cond HIDDEN_SYMBOLS   
00028     # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_FLOAT
00029     # define MPI_MAX_AMPS_IN_MSG (1LL<<29) // must be 2^int
00030     # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.8f"
00031     # define REAL_QASM_FORMAT "%.8g"
00032     # define REAL_EPS 1e-5
00033     # define absReal(X) fabs(X) // not fabsf(X) - better to return doubles where possible
00034     // \endcond
00035 /*
00036  * Double precision, which uses 8 bytes per amplitude component
00037  */
00038 # elif QuEST_PREC==2
00039     # define qreal double
00040     // \cond HIDDEN_SYMBOLS   
00041     # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_DOUBLE
00042     # define MPI_MAX_AMPS_IN_MSG (1LL<<28) // must be 2^int
00043     # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.14f"
00044     # define REAL_QASM_FORMAT "%.14g"
00045     # define REAL_EPS 1e-13
00046     # define absReal(X) fabs(X)
00047     // \endcond
00048 /*
00049  * Quad precision, which uses 16 bytes per amplitude component.
00050  * This is not compatible with most GPUs.
00051  */
00052 # elif QuEST_PREC==4
00053     # define qreal long double
00054     // \cond HIDDEN_SYMBOLS   
00055     # define MPI_QuEST_REAL MPI_LONG_DOUBLE
00056     # define MPI_MAX_AMPS_IN_MSG (1LL<<27) // must be 2^int
00057     # define REAL_STRING_FORMAT "%.17Lf"
00058     # define REAL_QASM_FORMAT "%.17Lg"
00059     # define REAL_EPS 1e-14
00060     # define absReal(X) fabsl(X)
00061     // \endcond
00062 # endif
00063 
00064 
00079 # endif // QUEST_PRECISION_H
